duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive, coordinate and process work from the management team in a timely and efficient manner.
Create calendar and checklists to execute multiple launches.
Report to Liz and Dave (ownership) results and provide informed analysis and recommendations.
Create products and collections within Shopify and prepare launches.
Schedule weekly meetings to keep teams informed and on task.
Backend logistics on Shopify and other platforms for weekly e-commerce and retail launches.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Apparel or related field
